column4: does someone has an asus notebook?I can't get wi-fi led on.Please help
wlan change to 1 ... but nothing happens!
u cant get the wifi to work ?
wifi works fine!...only the led is off. i don't know why
when you installed ubuntu, did the legacy drivers prompt you for a driver ?
i use the ndiswrapper with my BroadCom 4318 AirForce One ...
the problem is just the led or is there connectivity problem also ?
no problem. Only the led. (under win the led is on so it's not broken)
ya, this happened to a friend of mine, it has to do with the drivers, if connectivity is fine though , that is very wierd
cause usually when there is no led, bad driver
maybe someone that has BroadCom 4318 AirForce One ... could help me.I wish.
yea, i think that if you have well connectivity.. normally the driver is fine
maybe you need another driver more suitable that enables the led at startup
maybe not ... this is the only one that works with my card
yea.. you really got me on that one with the led issue
